price: Nokorε sε Nyankopͻn Nim ͻsoro ne asaase so ahuntasεm (nyinaa). Onyankopͻn deε N’ani tua dwuma a modie (nyinaa).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu ghayba al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā taʿmalūna
